legacyPatterns.description: Using legacy ASP.NET MVC 5 framework which requires IIS and Windows hosting
legacyPatterns.impact: Cannot run on Linux/containers without major rewrite
legacyPatterns.recommendation: Migrate to ASP.NET Core MVC or Razor Pages

legacyPatterns.description: WCF service library for product data access
legacyPatterns.impact: WCF is not supported in .NET Core/.NET 5+
legacyPatterns.recommendation: Migrate to REST API (ASP.NET Core Web API) or gRPC

legacyPatterns.description: Using MSMQ for asynchronous order processing
legacyPatterns.impact: MSMQ is Windows-only and not supported in containers
legacyPatterns.recommendation: Migrate to Azure Service Bus or Azure Storage Queues

legacyPatterns.description: Using old-style project files with packages.config
legacyPatterns.impact: Cannot use modern .NET tooling and features
legacyPatterns.recommendation: Convert to SDK-style projects with PackageReference

legacyPatterns.impact: Not compatible with modern configuration patterns
legacyPatterns.recommendation: Migrate to appsettings.json and modern configuration

legacyPatterns.description: Using ASP.NET session state for shopping cart
legacyPatterns.recommendation: Use distributed cache (Redis) or database for session

legacyPatterns.description: Web application designed for IIS hosting
legacyPatterns.impact: Cannot deploy to Azure Container Apps without migration

phases.name: Project Structure Modernization
tasks: Update all projects to target net10.0
Update NuGet packages to .NET 10 compatible versions

phases.name: Web Application Migration
phases.description: Migrate ASP.NET MVC 5 to ASP.NET Core MVC
tasks: Create new ASP.NET Core MVC project
Replace Session state with distributed cache

phases.name: WCF to REST API Migration
phases.description: Replace WCF service with ASP.NET Core Web API
tasks: Create ASP.NET Core Web API project
Convert WCF service contracts to API controllers
Implement REST endpoints for all operations
Update ProductCatalog to call REST API instead of WCF
Add proper error handling and status codes

phases.name: MSMQ to Azure Service Bus Migration
phases.description: Replace MSMQ with Azure Service Bus
tasks: Set up Azure Service Bus namespace and queue
Create Azure Service Bus client in web app
Replace MSMQ queue sending with Service Bus
Update OrderProcessor to consume from Service Bus
Implement error handling and retry logic

phases.name: Containerization
phases.description: Create Docker containers for all components

phases.name: Azure Container Apps Deployment
tasks: Set up managed identity for Azure Service Bus

codebaseSize.reason: ~2000 lines of code is moderate size

architecturalComplexity.reason: Multiple components (MVC, WCF, MSMQ) with different modernization paths

legacyTechnologyDebt.reason: Heavy use of Windows-only legacy technologies (WCF, MSMQ, IIS)

frameworkMigrationDifficulty.reason: ASP.NET MVC to Core and WCF to REST require significant changes

testCoverage.reason: No automated tests found, will need testing strategy

risks.risk: WCF to REST migration may require significant refactoring
risks.mitigation: Create API contracts first, migrate incrementally

risks.risk: MSMQ to Service Bus requires Azure infrastructure
risks.mitigation: Use Azure emulators for development, staged rollout

risks.risk: Session state migration may affect user experience
risks.mitigation: Implement distributed cache early, thorough testing

risks.risk: No automated tests increase regression risk
risks.mitigation: Create smoke tests before migration, add tests during migration

immediate: Create a development branch for modernization work
Set up .NET 10 SDK and development environment
Review and document current application behavior
Set up Azure resources (Container Registry, Service Bus) for dev/test
shortTerm: Start with Phase 1: Project structure modernization
Set up basic CI/CD pipeline for .NET 10 builds
Begin WCF to REST API migration as it's needed by web app
longTerm: Consider microservices architecture for future scalability
Implement proper logging and monitoring from the start
Document architecture decisions and migration patterns

successCriteria: Web application deployed to Azure Container Apps
MSMQ replaced with Azure Service Bus
All functionality working as in original application
Basic monitoring and logging in place
